_header: To Calvary he bare his cross with doleful pain
Note: The burden occurs as a round in Ravenscroft’s Pammelia, 1609.
_description: Gilbert Banaster, a song of the Passion — four stanzas (aaaabbbacca) and burden: ‘My feerfull dreme neuyr forgete can I’

BLAdd5465.Note:
